h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand
content: After you get the Buddha's Right Hand to around half of its health it will retreat, and you'll finally meet the owner of the hand.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Webbed_Hollow-Middle_Hollow_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Webbed Hollow - Middle Hollow Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Buddha's Right Hand'.
The content is as follows:
After you get the Buddha's Right Hand to around half of its health it will retreat, and you'll finally meet the owner of the hand.
